Name: Plum Bun Reformatted
About the game: The pages of this Visual Novel are handmade. Players are prompted to read in peace without modern distracting stimuli. Back towards the reader's inquiry, pages are designed and coded onto stabilized, focused pages that do not harm the eyes. The old, wise content guarantees a returning bookmark, including a small click noise when turning a page. Achievements are self-reinforced by reading further. The originally published 1928 novel was written by Jessie Redmon Fauset. Certain words are excluded and censored.
